name: Portal 0
description:
Portal 0

Portal 0 is a game, where you play as a fireboy. You explore a hot desert. As you are exploring, you find different portals. You can use these portals to your advantage and disadvantage. Can you get through all the levels and to the end?

Portals teleport you through objects. If you go into a portal, you will come from another portal.  if you go into a blue portal, you will come from a blue portal... Or wait... At least you are supposed to. Do you trust them or not?

Wowie jam 2.0

This game was made for the Wowie game jam 2.0. It was hosted by Jonas Tyroller. The time to build a game was one weekend.

Theme: Intentional Bugs

This game follows that theme.

Link to game jam:                                                                                                   https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-2

What was made during the jam?

All the art was made during the game jam.                                                                                      Music was also made in the jam. Sound effects were made using sfxr.                          Majority of the code was written during the jam.                                                                      The The whole project was made after the start of the jam.
